reviewText: I don't like it I hate it so much I thought about returning but keep it. I will not order another DVD.

This is a good DVD to show you how to use the Knitting Board.  It's a new phase of knitting without needles.  You use a board with pegs, and you wrap yarn around the pegs by using different wrapping techniques.  Really cool, but if you are a regular knitter who uses needles, you might not enjoy this new hobby which has become a new fad.

I ordered this item as a Christmas gift. It arrived in a bubble envelope with a hole in it. Inside the envelope was the DVD that should have been in the paper CD evelope, but it wasn't, and that was half in and out of a folded over piece of cardboard. I've seen this item in a yarn shop nicely packaged in a standard DVD case with labeling. This had neither, only the disc. Lots of other info regarding other items they sell that have nothing to do with what I bought. Would have been nice if time had been taken to make the item I bought nice to give as a gift than getting all the info I didn't need. I'll be sending this back if they don't supply a DVD case for it. Very Disappoint.Weave and Hook Knitting Board Basic I How-To DVD Instruction
